title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a horse in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a horse riding in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of a dream about riding a horse is considered one of the most common dreams that can be interpreted with many different interpretations. Many interpretation scholars have interpreted this vision with different connotations and meanings, and they considered that the interpretation of this dream should differ according to the dreamer’s condition, and many scholars have interpreted this vision with different connotations and meanings. They interpret this dream as being like Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Sirin, and Ibn Shaheen, and we will now mention the interpretations of each of them through this article. You may be interested: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream Interpretation of a dream about riding a horse in a dream Interpretation of a dream about riding a horse in a dream Seeing riding a horse in a dream is considered a good dream for its owner , as it shows that whoever sees the dream raises his status at work, and is likely to get a promotion or get another job. The dreamer sees that he is riding horses, this indicates that this person will be able to solve all problems and achieve all goals and aspirations in life. When A person sees himself dressed as a knight and riding a horse, this means that he has the ability to resist his grudges and envy. Seeing a sick fortune teller riding a horse indicates that this fortune teller is suffering from a financial problem. When you see that you are riding a black horse in a dream, it means that you are brave and insightful. When A man sees in his dream that he is riding a horse, which means that the date of his wife’s birth is approaching and that his child will be a male, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. You may be interested: Talking with the dead in a dream. Interpretation of the vision of riding by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dream that you are riding a horse in a dream. Seeing a horse in a competition in a dream It means that whoever sees this dream is a successful person and someone who excels in his life and has the ability to achieve his goals and desires in life. Riding a horse in an easy way in a dream is almost a sign of satisfaction, or the dreamer’s wedding is approaching or getting a promotion at work. You may be interested Also with: Pumpkins in a dreamInterpretation of seeing riding a lone horseWhen an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is riding a horse, this means that this girl will expand her livelihood and will receive good news, and seeing white horses in her dream promises that joy and happiness will come and improve conditions from a good young man, and if she sees If an unmarried woman sees a sick horse in a dream, this is evidence of increasing suffering and psychological problems, but seeing a horse riding in a dream indicates the approaching marriage of this girl to a wonderful young man. Qualities.You may also be interested in the following: I saw my husband getting married. A vision of riding a brown horse for singles. If an unmarried girl sees that she is riding a brown horse, this means that she will make a lot of profits, but riding a black horse in a dream indicates that this girl is successful and can make her dreams come true. And her desires in this life. Interpretation of a married woman riding. The interpretation of a dream of a married woman riding has many different interpretations, such as: The researcher Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a white horse in a married woman’s dream is considered good news for her to improve her life in all matters and achieve her hopes and goals in the neighborhood.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a squirrel in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a squirrel by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Shirin said: From the beginning, seeing a squirrel in a dream shows very good food. If you see a dreamer feeding a squirrel in his dream, this means changes for the better in his life. A squirrel of large size in a dream indicates the arrival of benefit in the dreamer’s life. Also, killing a squirrel in The dream indicates his victory over his enemies. Slaughtering a squirrel in a dream indicates a life full of success and the achievement of goals and desires. The interpretation of a dream about a squirrel bite in a dream indicates the presence of a person who is spiteful to the dreamer and wants to harm him. Seeing a squirrel running after a person in a dream is considered the emergence of some problems that cannot be avoided. It lasts. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a monkey in a dream. Interpretation of a squirrel in a dream for a single woman. A dream about a squirrel for an unmarried woman is considered one of the praiseworthy dreams that indicate goodness and happiness. Seeing a white squirrel in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she will soon marry a good man with whom she will be happy. A yellow squirrel in a dream announces for a girl a calm and stable life. Also, if a girl sees in her dream a squirrel running and jumping, this indicates changes for the better in her life. Seeing a small squirrel indicates his purity and good reputation among people. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a gorilla in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a squirrel For a married woman: Seeing a squirrel in a dream for a married woman indicates the stability of her married life and her husband’s intense love for her. If a woman dreams that her husband gives her a squirrel, this means that she will be blessed with pregnancy soon. Seeing a squirrel in her house in a dream means kindness and a lot of sustenance that she and her husband will receive. Also, killing a squirrel in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will get rid of her troubles and sorrows. But seeing a dead squirrel in her dream indicates the troubles and fears that the woman will suffer in her next life, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing rabbits in a dream Interpretation of seeing a squirrel for a pregnant womanto dream A pregnant woman chasing a squirrel means that she will be blessed with the child she wants. The presence of a large number of squirrels in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the ease of giving birth to a newborn and enjoying good health. A squirrel in a dream for a divorced woman. The interpretation of seeing a squirrel in a dream for a divorced woman is one of the visions that shows her kindness and justice in the circumstances. Also, seeing a divorced woman playing with a squirrel in a dream is a sign of the end of her problems. Seeing a woman being hurt by a squirrel in a dream is one of the visions that indicate evil and many obstacles before her. A squirrel in a man’s dream. A man who catches a squirrel in his dream shows a lot of sustenance. And the good that he will get. Slaughtering a squirrel in a dream means getting rid of worries and problems and getting rid of anxiety. But a squirrel bite in a dream for a man warns him that there are some people who hate him in his life and he needs to get rid of them. Interpretation of seeing a black squirrel in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a black squirrel in a dream. To some problems and difficulties that the dreamer suffers from in his life. Seeing a black squirrel in a dream also symbolizes misfortunes and unfortunate events.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a white sheep in a dream in Al-Osaimi and its most prominent meanings

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a white sheep in a dream according to Al-Osaimi and its most prominent connotations, as the sheep is known as one of the types of animals raised in homes, and in a dream it has many connotations that refer to it, such as spoils, husbands, and possessions, in addition to children, plants, and trees, whether they are carriers or even fruitful. Today, through the lines of our article, we will learn about the interpretation. A dream about a white sheep.Interpretation of a dream about a white sheep in a dream about Al-Asimi. Interpretation of seeing a white sheep in a dream is one of the most mysterious dreams that remained unknown to the dreamer. The interpretation of seeing a white sheep in a dream is as follows: Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a white sheep in a dream with three different connotations, so that it indicates in the first To the blessing that will come to the dreamer’s house and the goodness will remain in his house for many days, while the second sign indicates the fulfillment of one of the blessings that the dreamer urgently requested. Finally, the third indicator is to get rid of all feelings of hatred and resentment present in the dreamer’s heart, in addition to giving him feelings of love and lasting satisfaction with what God has separated from him. As for Ibn Sirin, he interpreted seeing a lot of property in a dream as a sign of good offspring that the dreamer will enjoy. If the dreamer carries the song on his back, this indicates that he is taking care of an elderly person, perhaps one of his parents or even one of his grandparents. The dreamer who rides on the back of a sheep in a dream indicates his trustworthiness, which is that he relies on others to deal with many matters related to him. As I explained to Sirin Seeing a white sheep in a dream for a farmer indicates a very good and plentiful diet that he will enjoy. Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing sheep in a dream, depending on the number of sheep that were in the dream, the dreamer will have a great and wonderful relationship in society. The sign of a white sheep in a dream is that the dreamer has a responsible personality It enables him to be fair among people and to manage matters from the middle and his judgment. The dreamer who slaughters sheep in a dream and skins them indicates that he will obtain a lot of money from his opponents in particular. Seeing white sheep can be a sign of the abundance of goodness. Seeing the heads of sheep indicates... An increase in the dreamer’s life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about stealing and escaping from the police in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a sheep pen for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream varies from one person to another, depending on the situation in which the dreamer finds himself, in addition to the circumstances he is going through, whether they are in real life or even In a dream. The interpretation of seeing a white sheep in a dream is as follows: Seeing an unmarried woman carrying a white sheep in a dream indicates the fulfillment of many of her long-awaited aspirations and dreams. But if an unmarried woman sees a flock of white sheep in her dream, this is an indication that she will soon receive a sum of money. It would improve her current financial situation. Finally, if an unmarried girl sees the white sheep attacking her and feels fear and anxiety in the dream and tries to escape, this indicates that there are many people in her environment who are trying to harm her in any way. Watch.

title: Interpretation of a dream that I read Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream in which I read Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream, dear reader, you can learn interpretations of reading the Qur’an. Interpretation of a dream that I read Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream. Interpretation of a dream in which I read Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream can portend goodness, God willing, as if a married man is seen reading Surat Al-Baqarah, this may lead to the opening of doors. Goodness, and God is All-Knowing. If a married woman is seen reading Surat Al-Fatihah in a dream, perhaps this indicates her benefit and wisdom, and God knows everything that no one has seen. If an unmarried girl is seen reading Surat Al-Fatihah, it may be a sign of a new beginning, God willing. Interpretation of a dream that I read Surat Al-Baqarah In a dream, interpretation of a dream in which you read Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream can lead to goodness and sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowledgeable. Whereas if a married woman sees Surat Al-Baqarah, it may be evidence of goodness and sustenance, and God knows all the unseen. If a married man sees Surat Al-Baqarah, it may be a sign of blessing for the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. If a young man is seen reciting Surat Al-Baqarah, it may be a sign of joy for the dreamer, and God Most High knows. Interpretation of a dream that I read Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I read Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream, it could be a sign of faith and piety, and God is All-Knowing. In the event that the dreamer sees the recitation of Surat Al-Ikhlas, it may lead to an answer. He wills, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream, it may indicate repentance from sins and transgressions, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream, this may indicate that he has reached a high rank and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream in which he read Ayat Al-Kursi. In a dream, the interpretation of the dream in which you read Ayat al-Kursi in a dream portends repelling harm and hatred, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married man is seen reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream, this may indicate faith, and God is All-Knowing. If a married woman is seen reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream, this may be a recovery from illness, and God The greatest and most knowledgeable. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream the recitation of Ayat al-Kursi, this can lead to security and safety, and God knows everything that no one has seen. Interpretation of a dream that I read the prayers in a dream. Interpretation of the dream in which I read women’s prayers in a dream can express an evil response to the dreamer, and God I know the unseen. Likewise, if a married woman is seen reciting women’s prayers in a dream, this may be a sign of goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. In the case of seeing a divorced woman reciting women’s prayers in a dream, this can lead to salvation from envy, and God knows the unseen. In the event that he sees An unmarried young man himself recites suffering in a dream. This may be a sign of getting rid of envy, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of dreams is that I read supplications in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I read supplications in a dream can indicate a good and good situation, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman is seen reciting supplications in a dream This may indicate paying off her debts, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl is seen reciting dhikr, it may relieve her of the problems she may face, and God knows all that no one has seen. Interpretation of a dream that I am reading Quran.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Istikhara prayer in a dream - signs of Istikhara prayer

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Istikhara prayer in a dream - signs of Istikhara prayer. Interpretation of dreams about seeing Istikhara prayer in a dream - seeing prayer in a dream. An exciting interpretation of Istikhara prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about Istikhara prayer in a dream. Istikharah prayer in a dream dispels confusion and indicates a good ending. Signs of prayer Istikhara regarding marriage: Visible signs of acceptance: When the matter that the believer asks about is good and acceptable. The person becomes comfortable and reassured, that is, he opens his chest and is born with a great desire and willingness to achieve something. Scholars have stressed the need for a person to remove from his heart any inclination related to one of the goals before embarking on In Istikhara. A person should also state his intention and wait for what he sees. After Istikhara, he ignores the signs and indicators if they are comfortable and indicate acceptance and happiness. Or, on the contrary, the person feels uncomfortable and feels restricted by the appearance of the subject. This is what Muslim scholars have agreed upon in The meaning of accepting Istikhara. However, when the subject is bad and the person is likely to be harmed because of it, the user feels anxiety and fear. And aversion and effort to avoid it, even if he may have accepted Istikhara and have lust. The relationship of sight and Istikhara. The first link: It is not necessary for a person to dream of the subject that He asked God to help him. There is a condition accompanying Istikhara, as some people think that a person can see something in a dream. It is also possible that Istikhara does not see any sight. It is recommended to teach it to people of knowledge to try to find out what it means. Also, dreaming of a righteous person is an indication of goodness, as mentioned in Sahih Al-Bukhari. (Nothing remained of the prophecy except the missionaries, and they spoke. What missionaries? He said: Good eyesight. The second episode: The pregnant woman does not see anything in the dream or any indications, so her emotions are normal, and she does not feel distress, pleasure or excitement. And the man’s prayer on his part is illness, so if he prays sitting with an excuse, it will not be accepted. His deeds, and whoever abandons prayer intentionally is ungrateful. Each dream has a different interpretation from the other, and it often means to her that she is a guardian of her home and her husband, and that she obtains all goodness from them, because prayer prevents obscenity and evil. title: Seeing a wig in a dream and the meaning of wearing a wig for men and women

preview.html: A wig for those who do not know is a wig that a man or woman wears to change the look or hide a defect in their real hair, and therefore it is not popular with many people because it is a symbol of deception. We see a wig in the fingertips that has many different interpretations depending on the condition of the person seeing it and the circumstances of his vision. That is why in this The article will discuss with you the interpretation of seeing a wig in a dream, wearing a wig in a dream, interpretation of a dream about a wig for a divorced woman, a wig in a dream for a married woman, and wearing a wig in a dream for a single woman, so follow us with interest. A wig in a dream Interpretation of seeing a wig in A dream about a wig or a wig in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s fear and anxiety about his future. It can symbolize the mysteries and secrets that the dreamer hides under a certain cover or cover so that those around him do not know about them. Likewise, wearing a wig in a man’s dream is not worthy of praise because it symbolizes To the troubles and losses that he is exposed to during this period. Perhaps a wig in a man’s dream symbolizes his inability to bear his responsibilities and therefore he resorts to avoiding them and not confronting them. As for seeing a wig in a dream for an unmarried woman, it deserves praise for her and may symbolize their close relationship, whether Through engagement or marriage. Interpretation of a dream about a wig for a married woman is a symbol of improving circumstances and the relationship between her and her husband. It can symbolize the death of anxiety, relief from anxiety, and relief after anxiety. As for seeing hair extensions in a dream, it indicates a state of tension and pressure surrounding the dreamer. Seeing a wig in a bald man’s dream is a sign of abundant nutrition and good offspring. There is an opinion that says that a wig in a dream in the general sense is not good because it symbolizes bad morals and corruption of religion. See also: I dreamed that I had long hair. Cutting hair in a dream. Wearing a wig in a dream. Symbol interpretation Dreaming about wearing a wig indicates the dreamer’s efforts and trying to achieve what he wants and trying to achieve his ambitions in various ways. The interpretation of single women wearing a wig and being happy with it is a symbol of their relationship and their soon marriage. As for a married woman wearing a wig in a dream, it symbolizes the improvement of her condition, and there is an opinion that says that it is a symbol that she is passing through She has some disagreements with her husband. As for a pregnant woman who wears a wig in her dream and she is satisfied with it, this symbolizes her pregnancy with his child. As for seeing a man wearing a wig in a dream in general, its interpretation is not suitable for him because it symbolizes financial loss and a lot of debt. Perhaps the wig in the dream symbolizes Also to the man who will suffer from a scandal. Interpretation of a dream about a wig for a divorced woman. As for the interpretation of a dream about a wig for a divorced woman, it symbolizes the woman’s attempt to hide her problems, difficulties, and suffering from those around her. Perhaps the interpretation of a dream about a wig for a divorced woman symbolizes the presence of some secrets that she is trying to hide from those around her because she does not Trust them. As for the interpretation of the dream of a long wig for a divorced woman, it shows that there are those who are trying to deceive her and take advantage of the back. As for the interpretation of the dream of a wig for a divorced woman and its fall, this is

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing cement in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of seeing cement in a dream, this is one of the promising visions that testifies to a lot of goodness, collecting money, and removing worry and worry. Interpretation of a dream about seeing cement in a dream has many signs. To see cement in a dream is single, married, pregnant, male. He sees cement. Cement is a material that can be designed to create strong concrete that will be used for construction purposes. Dreaming of mixing cement in a dream indicates the viewer’s diligence and patience to achieve his ambitions and desires and achieve his goals. In fact, it is rare that we see cement in our dreams, but this does not prevent it from containing many meanings that we will talk about in a detailed explanation of seeing cement in a dream in this article. Interpretation of seeing cement in a dream: Interpretation of seeing cement in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate A very good and ample livelihood, and an abundance of money and blessings. Seeing someone building a cement house in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s success in what he seeks. Dreaming of mixing cement in a dream indicates the dreamer’s diligence and patience to achieve his ambitions and desires and achieve his goals. Seeing rotten cement in a dream indicates that The dreamer believes in illusions and has no relation to reality. Dreaming of seeing dry cement in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s strength and ability to withstand crises, difficulties and challenges. Interpretation of a dream about cement for a single woman: Interpretation of seeing cement in a single woman’s dream, this indicates that she will achieve great success in her personal life. The dream of building a cement house in the dream of an unmarried girl is evidence of the soonest date of marriage to a suitable person who is characterized by generosity and good morals. Dreaming of seeing cement in a dream To see cement and clay in one woman’s dream shows extreme caution when dealing with others and is always cautious. Seeing cement breaking After construction in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she will enter into a failed romantic relationship that will end in separation and affect her psychological state. Also, the dream of seeing cement in a single woman’s dream is evidence that she will help people close to her with a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about cement for a married woman: indicates Interpretation of a dream about white cement in a dream for married people means a decent life and an abundance of grace and blessings in their lives and in their children. Seeing a cement house in a married woman’s dream shows the strength of her relationship with her husband, full of love, affection and harmony between them. To dream of owning a bag of cement in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she is a woman. She pleases her husband and supports her family and children. Dreaming of seeing cement in a dream: Dreaming of seeing black cement in a married woman’s dream may indicate some family disputes with the husband, but they will pass peacefully. Interpretation of a dream about cement for a pregnant woman: If you see yourself buying cement in a pregnant woman’s dream in the months First, it may mean that she will give birth to a male child and will be happy after his birth. Dreaming of seeing cement in a dream: The dream of walking on cement in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of easy childbirth because she is reassured of her safety and the safety of her child. Interpretation of a man’s vision of cement

title: Interpretation of a dream about a chameleon by seeing a chameleon in a dream by Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: The dream of a chameleon is to return home. A green chameleon in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a colored chameleon. Interpretation of a dream of a chameleon for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream of a green chameleon by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of a black chameleon. A chameleon bite in a dream. A green chameleon in a dream by Ibn Sirin. A chameleon in a dream. The king’s minister or successor, he almost never leaves him or avoids him even at the end of the day. He is His friend who calls him and sits with him is the owner of a war that he waged between people. The chameleon is a man who is persistent in matters and indicates service to heroes or turmoil in religion or the witch because she always revolves with the sun, so she rises when it rises and disappears when it sets and sets. Mourning the dead. Interpretation of a dream about a chameleon. Interpretation scholars have confirmed that seeing a chameleon in a dream is an unpopular and hateful matter. If we divide the word chameleon, we find that it indicates the meanings of the first and second war and epidemic. War and epidemic are matters that have negative effects on society and people in all circumstances, because their interpretation is evidence of war and its coming, and it indicates the presence of an envious person, characterized by hypocrisy and undesirable, but its interpretation is that a chameleon in a dream is worthy of praise. If it is slaughtered, this is evidence of... A person is healed from a disease, but if it burns, this indicates the presence of impure spirits. Interpretation of a dream about a chameleon for a single girl. The interpretation of a dream about a chameleon for a single woman varies depending on its color and the way it appears in the dream, as if it were black in color, and this is evidence of the presence of a person in her life who is not good. The gray chameleon is considered evidence On the girl’s inability to see what is going on around her regarding the decision to marry, and the appearance of the red chameleon is evidence that this girl is rushing towards an inappropriate path. Interpretation of a dream about a chameleon for a married woman When a chameleon appears in a married woman’s dream, this is evidence of fluctuations in her married life and good fluctuations in Its life if the chameleon is green. As for the olive chameleon, it is evidence of the coming of goodness and abundance of money, and it is better to see the chameleon eating its food from tree leaves and not from the house as if it were there. Food to be eaten. From the home, this indicates a lack of resources in the home, and seeing a slaughtered chameleon indicates the absence of worry and anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about a chameleon for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees a green chameleon, this indicates the safety of her pregnancy. As for the red chameleon, this is evidence of the earliest date of birth, and it should Preparing for it. But when you see a black chameleon, it means that the child will be a male. title: Interpretation of seeing a hospital in a dream and dreaming of entering a hospital

preview.html: Seeing a hospital in a dream symbolizes illness and the need to get rid of fatigue and unhappiness, and hospitalization fever indicates that he is going through difficult circumstances. Whoever sees himself leaving the hospital in a dream, this indicates signs of the end of the distress and difficulties that he is suffering from, and seeing a patient in the hospital in a dream indicates changes in the relationship with him. And many differences. Interpretation of seeing a hospital in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained the hospital in a dream with parts of rumors, theft of money, and the separation of children. A dream about a hospital can be interpreted as anxiety and instability in life, and whoever sees himself in a hospital with patients in a dream, this indicates the connection of families to Sharia and religion. And a hospital in a dream in general is not good. If you see yourself in a children’s hospital in a dream, this indicates great fears and sorrows, and a madhouse in a dream means imprisonment with criminals. Ibn Sirin said: Seeing a dead person in a hospital in a dream indicates his bad condition at home. In the future. Whoever sees himself in a hospital in a dream and is in good health, he will suffer from a serious illness. Whoever is sick and his illness will be prolonged, and perhaps his life will be near, and the hospital in a dream for the poor shows his need for people, and will achieve goodness and prosperity. Whoever sees that he has become a doctor in a hospital in a dream, this indicates To increase his wisdom and value among people. Helping people of knowledge and knowledge, and whoever sees patients in the hospital in a dream, this indicates poor conditions and a lack of well-being. Going to the hospital in an ambulance in a dream means that you are going through difficulties and crises. Hearing the sound of an ambulance in a dream indicates imminent dangers, and a dream about paying a hospital bill indicates paying taxes and paying... The financial obligations borne by the dreamer. The hospital in a dream is good news. The maternity ward in a dream is good news that relief and new beginnings are near. Likewise, the crazy hospital in a dream is good news for improving health and longevity. Leaving the hospital in a dream is good news for stopping problems and worries and ending them. The dream of escaping from the hospital portends discharge. Of distress and anxiety. Ordeal. The hospital in a dream for a pregnant woman gives good news. Her birth is close to her in health and safety. Visiting a sick person in the hospital in a dream is good news for a single woman, with a reunion with the person she loves and repairing relations with him. Visiting a sick person in the hospital in a dream for a married woman is good news as it approaches. Pregnancy after a long wait. Seeing a hospital is good news in a dream when the dreamer is unemployed in reality or poor, and a dream about a hospital can be a promising vision if the dreamer performed an operation in which the dreamer succeeded and seeing nurses in the hospital in a dream is a promising vision for relief and making things easier. Interpretation of seeing a hospital in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a hospital in a dream for a single woman means fun and distraction from work and duties, and entering the hospital in a dream for a single woman indicates that she is going through a crisis and needs help. If an unmarried girl sees the hospital and nurses in her dream, this means that she will receive
